text: ŠK Kremnička was a Slovak football team, based in the town of Banská Bystrica. The club was founded in 1952 and dissolved in Summer 2017, after decision of club's owner Milan Smädo to save youth teams of collapsed club MFK Dukla Banská Bystrica and continuous with a long tradition of the name Dukla.Je to potvrdené! V tretej lige namiesto Kremničky MFK Dukla Banská Bystrica 26.06.2017, bystricoviny.sk. ==References== == External links == *Futbalnet profile *Official club website * *at bystricoviny.sk Category:Defunct football clubs in Slovakia Category:Sport in Banská Bystrica Category:Association football clubs established in 1952 Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 2017 Category:1952 establishments in Slovakia
title: ŠK Kremnička
